name: Diluc
desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period (5s)
battle_talent.final_desc:
Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: The Pyro Enchantment provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally. Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

sof.sof1_desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.
sof.sof2_desc: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s. This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.
sof.sof3_desc: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt. 2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.
sof.sof5_desc: Increases the Level of Dawn by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
sof.sof6_desc: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
